Articles.Content: It would be great to see you centre of mass, centre of lift and centre of thrust in flight so you can balance it by switching the fuel in tanks. Also if there is a mod for that then tell me it too
Orbiter have that thrust/lift/drag/gravity arrow, add that too
In flight, CoM of the ship is exactly in the center of the screen.
Unless you move the camera away from it (IIRC, dragging with the MMB will pan, to a certain extent). I think going to Map mode resets the camera to CoM, though.
